document_data.name: Muranee's Old Treasures
document_data.staff: [[Jeveldra Shieldwinter]] and five other adopted orphans
document_data.mainbody: '''Muranee's Old Treasures''' was a used goods and clothing store in [[Hultail]] of [[Cormyr]], ran by [[Muranee Crownlinden]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Muranee's Old Treasures stood on the southern side of the main street in Hultail that stretched from the town's east to its west side.
document_data.Structure: The store was set up inside of a regular house that Muranee had converted into a shop. Almost the entire house was used to display the shop's cornucopia of used goods, placed on tables on both the first and second floors. The kitchen, pantry, and back room where the women did their laundry and where the shop's back entrance was were all closed to customers. After Muranee's Old Treasures closed for the night, the women hoisted down their beds from the attic.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, Muranee ran the shop, helped by her six adopted wards. All younger women, Muranee's daughters, aided her in the shop's daily business, cooking, cleaning, and purchasing goods. [[Jeveldra Shieldwinter]] of [[Cormyr]] was the most competent of the store girls. They made a merry household.
